availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Murry (Lewis County, West Virginia, farm laborer and soldier)

body.p: Lewis County, West Virginia, farm laborer and soldier. North Carolina native. Married to Julia Murry. Served in the 10th West Virginia Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as private from February 1864 to February 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Virginia, Lewis County, p. 47.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, West Virginia, Lewis County, Sheridan, p. 27.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of West Virginia, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M508, Roll 310.
